cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port for CU to an out-of-range value (99999) will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between CU and DU, preventing F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting PDSCH antenna ports XP to an invalid high value (99) will cause physical layer configuration errors and prevent proper downlink transmission setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PDSCH 天線埠 XP 設定為無效的高值 (99)，會導致實體層配置錯誤，並阻止正確的下行鏈路傳輸設定。
